definition: Mogao caves in Dunhuang 敦煌, Gansu
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
cave/hole

sentences.english: The Kizil Grottoes were built one century early than the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 克孜尔石窟营造年代早于敦煌莫高窟一个多世纪。

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供养菩萨，唐，石窟壁画，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: Today, I'd like to invite you to Mogao Caves, located at southeast of the center of Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我将带领您去坐落在敦煌市东南的莫高窟。

sentences.english: The Dunhuang Mogao Grottoes or Caves of One Thousand Buddhas is one of the three famous grottoes in China.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌莫高窟，俗称千佛洞，是中国三大宝窟之一。

sentences.english: In the autumn of the pen, with a kind of spirituality seems to the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 在秋雨的笔下，莫高窟似乎带着一种灵性。

sentences.english: First time I heard the Mogao Grottoes, because autumn text.
sentences.chinese: 第一次听到莫高窟，是因为秋雨的文字。

sentences.english: But, the Mogao Grottoes for me, is an exception.
sentences.chinese: 但，莫高窟对于我来说，是个例外。

sentences.english: The Mogao Grottoes courtyard pattern of Dunhuang regards stagger and superpose forms of four corners as the main characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌莫高窟天井图样以四角叠涩形式为主要特征。

definition: Dunhuang caves in Gansu/refers to Mogao caves 莫高石窟[Mo4 gao1 shi2 ku1]
Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu
Kezil thousand-Buddha grotto in Baicheng 拜城, Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区, Xinjiang
pinyin: Ke4 zi1 er3 qian1 fo2 dong4

definition: Buddhist grottos
Yungang Caves at Datong 大同, Shanxi 山西
Dunhuang county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
cave holding scripture depository, part of Mogao cave complex 莫高窟, Dunhuang 敦煌

the four great caves, namely: Longmen Grottoes 龍門石窟|龙门石窟[Long2 men2 Shi2 ku1] at Luoyang, Henan, Yungang Caves 雲岡石窟|云冈石窟[Yun2 gang1 Shi2 ku1] at Datong, Shanxi, Mogao Caves 莫高窟[Mo4 gao1 ku1] at Dunhuang, Gansu, and Mt Maiji Caves 麥積山石窟|麦积山石窟[Mai4 ji1 Shan1 Shi2 ku1] at Tianshui, Gansu
Kumbum (Chinese Ta'er), monastery in Qinhai, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
Potala, winter palace of Dalai Lamas in Lhasa, Tibet
Small Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an
Giant Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an
Yardang landform (formed by wind erosion)
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
